languages.text: "Приятно отметить, что Кровавая паутина не демонстрирует признаков ереси, в отличие от многих других культов смерти".
"I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."
languages.original_text: "Приятно отметить, что Кровавая паутина не демонстрирует признаков ереси, в отличие от многих других культов смерти".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."
"I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

"I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

languages.text: "Es erfreut mich, dass das Blutgesponnene Netz keinerlei Anzeichen von Ketzerei zeigt, im Gegensatz zu so vielen anderen Todeskulten."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

traits.locale_text: "Es erfreut mich, dass das Blutgesponnene Netz keinerlei Anzeichen von Ketzerei zeigt, im Gegensatz zu so vielen anderen Todeskulten."

languages.text: « Ravi de constater que la Toile de Sang ne montre aucun signe d'hérésie, contrairement à tant d'autres cultes de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

traits.locale_text: « Ravi de constater que la Toile de Sang ne montre aucun signe d'hérésie, contrairement à tant d'autres cultes de la mort. »

languages.text: «Me alegro de ver que la Red Sanguinolenta no exhibe ningún signo de herejía, a diferencia de muchos otros Cultos de la Muerte».
languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de ver que la Red Sanguinolenta no exhibe ningún signo de herejía, a diferencia de muchos otros Cultos de la Muerte».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが他の死のカルトのように異端をちらつかせておらず、心から安堵したよ」
languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが他の死のカルトのように異端をちらつかせておらず、心から安堵したよ」

languages.text: “与很多拜死教派不同，织血罗网并没有表现出任何异端迹象，这让我很是高兴。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

traits.locale_text: “与很多拜死教派不同，织血罗网并没有表现出任何异端迹象，这让我很是高兴。”

languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."

languages.text: "Nice ölüm tarikatlarının aksine Kanipi Ağı'nın hiçbir kâfirlik emaresi göstermediğini belirtmekten memnuniyet duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to note that the Bloodspun Web does not show any signs of heresy, unlike so many other death cults."
